metadata.name: Remote Thread Creation By Uncommon Source Image
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon processes creating remote threads.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\iexplore.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\powerpnt.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winlogon.exe'))) AND NOT (lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\winlogon.exe') AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.path)) in ('c:\\windows\\system32\\services\.exe', 'c:\\windows\\system32\\wininit\.exe', 'c:\\windows\\system32\\csrss\.exe', 'c:\\windows\\system32\\logonui\.exe')) OR lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\winlogon.exe') AND process.parent_process.pid = 4 OR (lower(LOWER(actor.process.name)) in ('c:\\windows\\system32\\schtasks\.exe', 'c:\\windows\\syswow64\\schtasks\.exe')) AND lower(process.file.path) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\conhost.exe') OR lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\explorer.exe') AND (startswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('c:\\program files\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\'))) OR lower(process.file.path) = lower('system') OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('c:\\program files\\'))) OR process.file.path is null OR lower(process.file.path) = lower('')) AND NOT (lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\program files\\internet explorer\\iexplore.exe') AND contains(lower(actor.process.cmd_line), lower('https://')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.cmd_line), lower('.checkpoint.com/documents/')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.cmd_line), lower('smartconsole_olh/')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.cmd_line), lower('default.htm#cshid=')) OR lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\program files\\internet explorer\\iexplore.exe') AND (startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\'))) AND contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\checkpoint\\smartconsole\\')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\smartconsole.exe')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\microsoft office\\')) AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\powerpnt.exe')) AND lower(process.file.path) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\csrss.exe')))

output.summary: Detects uncommon processes creating remote threads.

metadata.objective: False positive: This rule is best put in testing first in order to create a baseline that reflects the data in your environment. References: Personal research, statistical analysis, https://lolbas-project.github.io
